title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
content: ..Reward..We will announce 2 winners (entry) and each will receive $100 in BTCDeadline to submit your work is on 31st July 2023QuoteAt Sinbad.io, we are the most popular Bitcoin mixer. Sinbad allows you to Mix Your BTC Quickly using our premixed Bitcoin. Thus it breaks the link between the transactions before and after the mixing and makes it impossible to track the connection between the bitcoins that came into the mixer and went out. We require a new set of avatar for our current signature campaign. The avatar will need to blend well with our current signature set. We welcome you to join the contest and be one of the winner or $200 prize pool. - Sinbad Management..Rules and requirements..ðŸ‘‰ You must need to provide original and creative artworks, if found copied other's works or used templates found available online then you will be disqualified and tagged.ðŸ‘‰ You must need to follow forum requirements for avatar file format and dimension.ðŸ‘‰ The winning entries will need to surrender the source file of the original work.ðŸ‘‰ You can enter in the contest as many times as you want but each entry will need to have minimum three concepts or it will be disqualified.ðŸ‘‰ You can win both prize if we accept maximum two set of your entry which means you have chance to win the entire $200 of the prize pool.ðŸ‘‰ You must need to upload a set of large files of the images on imgur or this type of image hosting service which will allow to see all three concepts on one page. Example: https://imgur.com/a/XVw2aMeðŸ‘‰ I and Sinbad management have the full right to disqualify, deny or cancel any entry...How to submit your entry..Code:Avatar size images of the artwork: [img]https://i.ibb.co/pfvQPPf/sinbad1.png[/img] Â  [img]https://i.ibb.co/pfvQPPf/sinbad1.png[/img] Â  [img]https://i.ibb.co/pfvQPPf/sinbad1.png[/img]URL of the same image files in large size: https://imgur.com/a/XVw2aMeBech32 address: bc1qmxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxv7iAny description that describe your concepts: .onion/en]ðŸ“£This campaign is designed and managed by:General Disclaimer: We would like to make it clear that ðŸ’¹ðŸ“ˆ Bitcointalk Campaign Management ðŸ’ªðŸ”¥ Signature & Bounty, managed by Bitcointalk member Royse777, is an independent entity and is not directly affiliated with any of the crypto startups we advertise. While we strive to promote these startups in the best possible light, our views and opinions expressed in our advertising materials do not necessarily reflect those of the startups themselves. We work with various clients across the crypto industry, and our goal is to provide high-quality advertising services to help them achieve their marketing objectives.Payment Disclaimer: Please always check the escrow wallet (if available). If the escrow wallet does not have enough balance and you think you have risk not to get paid then discontinue from the campaign. We are not liable to pay you anything that is not available on the escrow wallet.

Stay in the shadow and keep your privacy safe. 2. nothing special, just random BTC flying away from Sinbad mixture to other wallets. Privacy is maintained with Sinbad Mixture.3. The speed, the privacy, the freedom. All come with Sinbad Mixture. This is my first doing avatar so I have no idea about what to submit. Tried something. If not acceptable then let me know. Software used: Photoshop cc and Adobe Illustrator.

comments.author: Not your key not your BTC
Orpichukwu
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 01, 2023, 07:19:54 PMHand drawing?Avatar contests... It's pure graphics and digital which means it should be designed with any of the graphics tools. Have never seen any avatar made of hand drawing. Will be a little difficult to achieve it's purpose.

comments.author: lucifur
comments.body: Reserve. Just in case I forgot.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Bump! We still have around 20 days! :-)Quote from: thepeterson on July 08, 2023, 03:40:30 PMdo you know the exact size in CM or MM?Avatar size isQuote120px wide, 80px tall, and 100 KiB in size. It must be a non-animated PNG, GIF, or JPEG image.

comments.author: thepeterson
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on July 11, 2023, 11:20:10 AMBump! We still have around 20 days! :-)Quote from: thepeterson on July 08, 2023, 03:40:30 PMdo you know the exact size in CM or MM?Avatar size isQuote120px wide, 80px tall, and 100 KiB in size. It must be a non-animated PNG, GIF, or JPEG image.Thank you.. so guys I'd be having small issue photoshopping before the deadline so I have drawn my idea.. if anyone wants to animate it and use it in his 3 concepts for a profit share if it got chosen as the winner I welcome that.The idea is about Sinbad having an octopus body squeezing bitcoins with his hands to have it divided into mbtc or whatever coming out of his sucker holes after being mixedMy profit share address: bc1qayjc2zk32dthw9pqakrv8twtm8neawux4l72t7The concept: Thanks

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 11, 2023, 01:43:45 PMThank you.. so guys I'd be having small issue photoshopping before the deadline so I have drawn my idea.. if anyone wants to animate it and use it in his 3 concepts for a profit share if it got chosen as the winner I welcome that.The idea is about Sinbad having an octopus body squeezing bitcoins with his hands to have it divided into mbtc or whatever coming out of his sucker holes after being mixed...Please tell me you're kidding us with this suggestion of yours. You want a reward for some scribbles on paper, where someone else will do the most important part of the work for you.I think the purpose of this contest is not to give away money for every poor attempt, but to rebrand the avatar and look for the best solution.

comments.author: thepeterson
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on July 11, 2023, 10:11:58 PMQuote from: thepeterson on July 11, 2023, 01:43:45 PMThank you.. so guys I'd be having small issue photoshopping before the deadline so I have drawn my idea.. if anyone wants to animate it and use it in his 3 concepts for a profit share if it got chosen as the winner I welcome that.The idea is about Sinbad having an octopus body squeezing bitcoins with his hands to have it divided into mbtc or whatever coming out of his sucker holes after being mixed...Please tell me you're kidding us with this suggestion of yours. You want a reward for some scribbles on paper, where someone else will do the most important part of the work for you.I think the purpose of this contest is not to give away money for every poor attempt, but to rebrand the avatar and look for the best solution.This is up to the designer who decides to use it. Has nothing to do with you or the contest itself. A design without idea is nothing and the opposite. So I don't see your point at all. Good luck.
